titleStmt.title: The declaration of Charles Duke of Sconberg, Lieutenant-General to His Majesty of Great Britain, and colonel of his First Regiment of English Guards, to the inhabitants of Dauphine
titleStmt.author: Schomberg, Charles Schomberg, Duke of, 1645-1693.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: At Ambrum, Aug. 29. 1692.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
